left join sys_user u on a.charge_person = u.id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM crm_custom a
WHERE a.id = #{id} and a.state = 1

SELECT
FROM crm_custom a
inner join sys_user su on su.id = a.charge_person and su.name like concat('%',#{chargePerson.name},'%')
and a.state = 1
and a.focus_products like concat('%',#{focusProducts},'%')
AND a.custom_source like concat('%',#{customSource},'%')
AND a.continent like concat('%', #{continent},'%')
AND a.country like concat('%',#{country},'%')
AND a.main_industry like concat('%', #{mainIndustry},'%')
AND a.focus_products like concat('%', #{focusProducts},'%')
AND a.deal_stage = #{dealStage}
AND a.reback = #{reback}
AND a.last_contact_time BETWEEN #{beginLastContactTime} AND #{endLastContactTime}
AND a.first_name LIKE '%'||#{firstName}||'%' '%'+#{firstName}+'%' concat('%',#{firstName},'%')
AND a.middle_name LIKE '%'||#{middleName}||'%' '%'+#{middleName}+'%' concat('%',#{middleName},'%')
AND a.last_name LIKE '%'||#{lastName}||'%' '%'+#{lastName}+'%' concat('%',#{lastName},'%')
AND a.company LIKE '%'||#{company}||'%' '%'+#{company}+'%' concat('%',#{company},'%')
AND ( a.email like concat('%', #{telEmailSite},'%') or a.phone like concat('%', #{telEmailSite},'%') or a.telephone like concat('%', #{telEmailSite},'%') or a.site like concat('%', #{telEmailSite},'%') )
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_time desc

INSERT INTO crm_custom( id, custom_source, continent, country, main_industry, management_format, focus_products, charge_person, deal_stage, reback, last_contact_time, first_name, middle_name, last_name, company, email, site, phone, telephone, remark, sys_deal_time, create_time, update_time, create_person, update_person, state, email_cycle ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{customSource}, #{continent}, #{country}, #{mainIndustry}, #{managementFormat}, #{focusProducts}, #{chargePerson.id}, #{dealStage}, #{reback}, #{lastContactTime}, #{firstName}, #{middleName}, #{lastName}, #{company}, #{email}, #{site}, #{phone}, #{telephone}, #{remark}, #{sysDealTime}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createPerson}, #{updatePerson}, #{state}, #{emailCycle} )
mapper.update: UPDATE crm_custom SET custom_source = #{customSource}, continent = #{continent}, country = #{country}, main_industry = #{mainIndustry}, management_format = #{managementFormat}, focus_products = #{focusProducts}, charge_person = #{chargePerson.id}, deal_stage = #{dealStage}, reback = #{reback}, last_contact_time = #{lastContactTime}, first_name = #{firstName}, middle_name = #{middleName}, last_name = #{lastName}, company = #{company}, email = #{email}, site = #{site}, phone = #{phone}, telephone = #{telephone}, remark = #{remark}, sys_deal_time = #{sysDealTime}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, create_person = #{createPerson}, update_person = #{updatePerson}, state = #{state}, email_cycle = #{emailCycle} WHERE id = #{id} and state = 1
update crm_custom SET email_cycle = #{emailCycle} where id=#{customId} and state = 1
update crm_custom SET email_cycle = #{emailCycle} where id in (${ids}) and state = 1
